mapper.sql: id, create_by AS createBy, update_by AS updateBy, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, tenant_id AS tenantId, create_by_name AS createByName, update_by_name AS updateByName, is_delete AS isDelete, share_type AS shareType, share_by AS shareBy, share_to_user AS shareToUser, data_id AS dataId, share_to_org AS shareToOrg, share_pwd AS sharePwd, invalid_time AS invalidTime
